name: frege91d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpd(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2)))

stmt.origin: ssbrd(c0, c1, c2, cfv(ctcl, c1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cfv(ctcl, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, cfv(ctcl, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wss(c1, cfv(ctcl, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c1, cfv(ctcl, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wss(c1, cfv(ctcl, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wss(c1, cfv(ctcl, c1)))

|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ctcl, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))

comment: If ` B ` follows ` A ` in ` R ` then ` B ` follows ` A ` in the transitive closure of ` R ` . Similar to Proposition 91 of [Frege1879] p. 68. Comparw with ~ frege91 . (Contributed by RP, 15-Jul-2020.)
